Apache Shiro :: Support :: Spring 1.2.3 API

Packages
org.apache.shiro.spring Spring Application Framework support for enabling Shiro in spring applications.
org.apache.shiro.spring.aop  
org.apache.shiro.spring.remoting Support to enable Spring-based remote method invocations to carry a Shiro session ID as part of the invocation payload, allowing remote clients to perform security operations.
org.apache.shiro.spring.security.interceptor Spring AOP support for enabling Shiro annotations in Spring-configured applications.
org.apache.shiro.spring.web Spring-specific components for use in Spring-based web applications.
